properties.initial cost type: constant number (without quotes) or 'random' for uniformly distributed initial guess

properties.options: String that contains PETSc options for the solver, e.g. -ksp_gmres_restart 5

properties.alpha: default for inexact policy iteration (fast) or exact, which is equivalent to standard policy iteration (slow). The accuracy is controlled by the outer stopping criterion

properties.outer stopping criterion: The maximum norm of the bellman residual function, e.g. 1e-9
